refnamediv.refpurpose: Menu: Export Scicos diagram and sub-diagrams graphics in various formats.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Export Scicos diagram and sub-diagrams graphics in various formats. The graphs of the main diagram and all sub-diagrams (Super Blocks) are written to files in various graphic formats. A graphic representation of the Super Blocks hierachy is also exported.
When the menu is executed the user is first asked for a directory where the output files will be stored. It is then asked for the desired output format.

The "scg" format is the Scilab binary format used to save Scilab graphics. Such files can be reloaded in Scilab using the load function and regenerate a Scilab graphic window. The Scilab graphic editor and function can then be used to modify this graphic.
